properties.name: Ha Long Bay
properties.description: Emerald waters dotted with 2,000 limestone karsts, UNESCO World Heritage Site

properties.name: Phong Nha Caves
properties.description: 400+ caves including Son Doong, the world's largest cave with 40m stalagmites

properties.name: Ninh Binh (Tam Coc)
properties.description: Ha Long Bay on Land with limestone karsts rising from rice paddies

properties.name: Mekong Delta
properties.description: Rice Bowl of Vietnam with floating markets and maze of waterways

properties.name: Hoi An Ancient Town
properties.description: Atmospheric UNESCO port town with Japanese bridge and lantern-lit streets

properties.name: Imperial City of Hue
properties.description: UNESCO-listed former imperial capital with royal tombs, citadel, and Perfume River

properties.name: Sapa Rice Terraces
properties.description: Stunning terraced rice fields in northwestern Vietnam with hill tribe villages

properties.name: Golden Bridge (Da Nang)
properties.description: Iconic pedestrian bridge held by giant stone hands with panoramic mountain views

properties.name: Cu Chi Tunnels
properties.description: Extensive underground tunnel network used during Vietnam War near Ho Chi Minh City
